item.description:
Graduation Night!  Thank you one and all for taking this journey with me.  Tonight we bring back an old friend and guest speaker to demonstrate how well Spanish wines pair with Italian food!  My 2 favorite things!  We'll dine under the stars in Antonio's private outdoor patio while we sip and savor our way through 5 wines over 4 courses. I will also be bringing in something very special from my personal wine cellar.  This is a dinner not to be missed as we say good-bye until September.  Proceeds go to St. Bernadette School.  Call/email/RSVP by May 31 as seating is limited.  Bring a friend or make some new ones.  When it comes to wine, we are all friends!

 

Cost: $65 per person all inclusive

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Grand Vin New Haven's Wine 101 Part 10 Graduation Dinner!
